sources.title: The Secret of Stamboul
sources.description: Title: The Secret of Stamboul Summary: A British agent travels to middle east during the war in order to spark a revolution. Directed by: Andrew Marton Actors: Valerie Hobson, Frank Vosper, James Mason Production Company: Richard Wainwright Productions Release Date: 1937 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A British agent travels to middle east during the war in order to spark a revolution.
